name: Brick Duel
description: Brick Duel is a Brick Breaker game for two players. Now you can play in arkanoid together on one phone or tablet. Each player controls a platform on his side of the screen. The game will appeal to all fans of the Brick Breaker genre, who have long dreamed of a multiplayer mode. Next will be the rules by which competition takes place. The Brick Duel game has three different modes. In all modes with bricks in the middle, you can choose one of 8 different levels.
